titleStmt.title: A reply as true as steele to a rusty, rayling, ridiculous, lying libell which was lately written by an impudent unfoder'd Ironmonger and called by the name of An answer to a foolish pamphlet entituled, A swarme of sectaries and schismatiques / by John Taylovr.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
